summary: After falling pregnant to a pharmacist and refusing to marry, a young woman is thrown from her home and sent to a strict girls' reform school.
cast: Louise Brooks|André Roanne|Josef Rovenský|Fritz Rasp|Vera Pawlowa|Franziska Kinz|Arnold Korff|Andrews Engelmann|Valeska Gert|Edith Meinhard|Sybille Schmitz|Sig Arno|Kurt Gerron|Hedy Krilla|Hans Casparius|Jaro Fürth|Emmy Wyda|Marfa Kassatskaya|Sylvia Torf|Michael von Newlinsky
title: Tres páginas de un diario
